Name: gastrin secretion abnormality
Definition: A congenital hypoplastic anemia characterized by progressive pancytopenia with bone marrow failure

Name: abnormality of glucagon secretion
Definition: A filariasis that is a zoonotic infection caused by the nematode of the genus Dipetalonema

Name: post-surgical hypoinsulinemia
Definition: A sensory system cancer located_in the eye that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in the eye.

Name: obsolete macrocephaly
Definition: A sensory system cancer located_in the eye that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in the eye.

Name: pancreatic cholera
Definition: An acute inflammation of lacrimal passage that is characterized by inflammation of the lacrimal caniculi
